text: ohuwa adhikarana waidya niladhariwarayeku hamuwata idiripath karala naha.
mama ee welawedi sabhawata kiwwa, “ada me uthsawayata rathnapala walisinha mahaththaya awilla innawa, ohu saha gunasinha mahaththaya sambandha wirakriyawakin thamayi mama mage potha patan ganne.
namuth oba wasara gananawak thisse puhunu kara thibe nam, oba wisin yojitha piyawara kriyathmaka wanne nam, pradhana anga thibe nam ho oba "podu waradi" .
(rathinynya karal dekak genna yana gaman) sthuthiyi link ekata...
mama aapasu hari balannata pramada nowemi…
eya maniya yuththe janathawage chanda padanama ho anupathayen nowa, ratata athi drushtiya, darshanaya ha loka dakmata anuwaya.

unda oya widen wide as as si ethakota ach as si gana kiyola thibunata ee akuru walin kiyawenne mokakda kiyalawath kiyala thibune naha...

janadhipathi lekam ostin pranandu prakasha kale, japana sancharaya nimawa eeye rathri diwayinata pamini janadhipathithuma adala gasat niwedanayata athsan kala bawa ya.

kese wuwath apa thula athi tharangayada kalawa ha sambandha wu dinaye patan athikala wu wiplawaya, ada hudek rasawindanaya udesa wu chithrapata ha rupawahini natya kalawa thulin loku kuda kageth hith thula mahath winashayak karamin sitina bawa nam sabaya.

manawa himikam kadawimak sambandhawa thawaduratath rajaye aayathana walin pilisarana pathime awakashayak pawathida?widhayakaya wisin kerena manawa himikam kadakirimakadi purawasiyanta pilisarana pathiya haki aayathanaya lesa adhikaranaya hadinwe.hamuda soldaduwan pirisak wisin krishanthi kumaraswami nam damila tharuniya dushanaya kota mara damunu awasthawe ee pilibada nadu asa thindu nikuth kirimata tharam ho yam winiwidabhawayak merata adhikarana kriyawaliya thula pawathuna yayi kiwa haka.namuth ada wanawita thathwaya kawarakda?ema awama winiwidabhawaya ho suraki thibeda?asadharana lesa siragatha kale yayi jathyanthara manawa himikam komisama wisin thindu kala nallarathnam sinharasata merata adhikaranaya wisin itu kala yukthiya kumakda?deshapalana gathikama matha chandana kathriaarachchige minimarum pilibada adhichodana iwathkaraganna,abdul kadarge dushana chodana iwathkaraganna nithipathiwarayekugen apeksha kala haki manawa himikam sahathikaya kawarakda?yuda adhikaranaya wanahi rate piligath nila adhikarana wisheshayaki yanuwen thindu dimata tharam deshapalanikawa pakshagrahi wi athi yanthranayakin aaraksha we yayi balaporoththu wiya haki purawasi ayithiyak thibeda?
prayogika thalayedi, palath palana aayathanawala aniwarya kan…

eeth kaluwara nisa katawath aathata penne naha.

hitapu amathiwarun dedenekuge puthun dedena thawamath athadanguwe owun siyalu dena thurki agamathiwarayage aadharakaruwan.hitapu amathiwarun dedenekuge puthun dedena saha rajya bankuwaka pradhaniya thawamath sitinne athadanguwe.sithala yuddhayain pasuwa thurki aanduwa saha polisiya athara sabandatha naraka athata harennata patan gath athara thurki aanduwe mithra parshawa dekak athara pawathi sithala yuddhaya unusum wiya.agamathi rejep tayip ardowan ge eekepi pakshaya anagamika pakshayaki.

rathmalana shri wimalaramadhipathi rathmalana shasanarakshaka mandalaye lekhakadhikari basnahira palathe pradhana adhikarana sanghanayaka kawya kala bhushana rajya sammana labhi aththudawe piyarathana na himidehiwala galkissa maha nagara sabha pradeshaya thula pawathna loku kuda wihara sthana asu pahen ha rathmalana aasanaya thula athi loku kuda wiharasthana hathalis hatharen ekka wuth rathmalana thunwana patumanga pihiti shri dhammikaramaya thriwidha chaithyayangen ha wenath awashya loku kuda wiharangayangen piripun dakumkalu wiharasthanayaki.
